attributes.action: Petition for a more proactive police approach to motorcycle theft in the UK
attributes.background:
I head a large motorcycle group based in the south west of the U.K.
A number of my members have fallen victim to motorcycle theft with the perpetrators and gangs responsible openly flouting what they are doing on numerous social media sites.

rejection.details:
Policing in your local area is the responsibility of your elected Police and Crime Commissioner (PCC). 

You can find your local PCC here:

https://www.police.uk/
